speaker1.name: Murat Azamov
speaker1.description: Founder and expert in business systematization, Uzbekistan Franchise Association (UFA). More than 300 stores in 10 countries of the world. Among clients: Collin's, Nautica

speaker2.name: Maxim Shabashov
speaker2.description: Managing director of Lynks Property Management in Uzbekistan with more than 20 years of experience in managing mixed-use properties. He oversaw projects such as MFC 'Lety', 'Nordmoll' and 'MODERA Towers', and successfully took the company to the Uzbek market. Lives in Tashkent with his family.

HomePageParagraph.title: UzMall
HomePageParagraph.description: Brings together players in the commercial and mixed-use real estate market, investments, management and operations, consulting, retail, leasing, technology and services for these sectors.

exhibition.title: Largest Industry Exhibition in Central Asia
exhibition.description: For commercial real estate and retail, bringing together 100+ participants, 500+ brands and 9000+ visitors

networking.title: Global Networking
networking.description: Business meetings, new connections, negotiations and communication with key industry leaders

forum.title: Commercial Real Estate Forum
forum.description: Here, trends for the next 5 years will be announced, practical cases and success stories in the industry will be shared

awards.title: CRE AWARDS - Commercial Real Estate Award
awards.description: The Uzmall Awards is presented for significant contributions and successful activities in the commercial real estate and retail market in Uzbekistan.

experts.thinText: international experts who will share market development trends for the next 5-10 years

creAwards.title: CRE AWARDS
creAwards.description1: The UzMall Awards is presented for significant contributions and successful activities in the commercial real estate and retail market in Uzbekistan.
creAwards.description2: The best developers, retail chains, companies with technologies and innovations will be awarded for the first time on behalf of the industry expert community. This is a recognition of the highest quality of work, stability and leadership positions.
creAwards.description3: Currently, we are approving nominations and the list of judges. Follow updates on our social networks and website.

individualConstruction.title: Individual Construction
individualConstruction.description: You rent an area where you can independently design a unique stand, which will allow you to better emphasize your company's features and stand out among other brands.

turnkeyStand.title: Turnkey Stand
turnkeyStand.description: You don't need to deal with construction and equipment of the space, we will prepare a unique stand for you that meets all the requirements and standards of the event.

speaker.title: Become a Stage Speaker
speaker.description: You will be able to speak to an audience of 150-200 people, announce your company, your products and services, and establish new contacts.

moreInfo.title: Learn More
moreInfo.description: The full list and details about collaboration formats can be obtained from the manager by submitting an application.
